item.description:
Ages ago a terrible evil threatened to overwhelm the land, but through the courage and skill of the goodly folk, it was sealed deep beneath the earth. There are places, though, where it draws closer to the surface than others, and in recent days there has been unusual activity in one such area - strangers moving about and dimly-seen, twisted shapes out in the marshes. Can you protect the innocent from the attention of the Lord of Eyes? Join a company of heroes sent to investigate and save the day in this 3 hour D&D adventure!

Call us at 781-270-4800 to pre-register; $15/member, $20/nonmember.
item.name: Dungeons & Dragons Night: Khyber's Harvest
